License information

Joda-Time source code is released under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 license. This is the same license as Ant, Spring, Tomcat and Jakarta.

As is normal with the Apache 2.0 license, a NOTICE file is used to express Joda-Time specifics: 

=============================================================================
= NOTICE file corresponding to section 4d of the Apache License Version 2.0 =
=============================================================================
This product includes software developed by
Joda.org (http://www.joda.org/).
Copyright © 2005-2013 Joda.org. All Rights Reserved.
